name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Laser Resonator (Advanced Content)
2. Temporal Dynamics of Lasers (Advanced Content)
3. Nonlinear Optics (Advanced Content)
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Laser Resonator (Advanced Content) (4 weeks)
Temporal Dynamics of Lasers (Advanced Content) (2 weeks)
Midterm Exam
Temporal Dynamics of Lasers (Advanced Content) (2 weeks)
Nonlinear Optics (Advanced Content) (5 weeks)
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 20% (Submission of on-site coding exam)
Final Exam: 20% (Submission of on-site coding exam)
Homework: 60% (Based on 10 coding assignments)

Note: Proficiency in Matlab basics is required.
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
consultation: Office Hours: Fri 17:00~19:00To reserve a time, please email in advance to jungchen.tung@mail.ntut.edu.tw
